sentences: Tony Destra (September 20, 1954 â€“ February 8, 1987), was an American drummer who played for the glam metal bands Cinderella and Britny Fox.
Before Cinderella or Britny Fox, Tony was the drummer for another popular Philadelphia area band called Enforcer.
After he left Cinderella, he joined Britny Fox in 1985.
He played on the Britny Fox demo In America in 1986.
Tony died in a car accident on February 8, 1987.
